description:
Another shoot done in our real time format with no cuts. This is as live as it gets with out being “live”. A real session with a feisty DOM as the sub. Mika was getting ready for a
Men in Pain
shoot as a DOM one morning. We told her Men in Pain was delayed and we had to shoot Hogtied now!. Confused and not too happy, she stumbled onto the set and she was taken. It wasn’t happening as she planned, but it was happening as she agreed. Also, we have included some of Mika past performances to set the mood for this shoot.
title: Mika Tan and Sebastian
